rituals.title: Egg Personal Cleansing Spell
rituals.summary: Use a whole egg to absorb negative energy and spiritual debris from your aura.

steps.title: Cleanse the Body
steps.content: Pass a whole raw egg over your body, moving from the top downwards, mentally focusing on eliminating any negative psychic debris.

steps.title: Dispose of the Egg
steps.content: Take the egg outside, far from your home, and smash it on the ground. Return home via a different, circuitous route without looking back.

rituals.title: Destroy All Evil Bath
rituals.summary: A powerful bath to destroy evil influences and protect the bather.

steps.title: Prepare the Water
steps.content: Add at least one cup of Florida Water and one cup of sea salt to a tub filled with warm water.

steps.title: Add Vinegar
steps.content: Add a generous splash of Four Thieves Vinegar into the tub.

steps.title: Add Essential Oil
steps.content: Just before you enter the water, add nine drops of essential oil of rosemary.

steps.title: Bathe
steps.content: Submerge yourself completely to destroy all evil influences.

rituals.title: Ocean Water Asperging Spell
rituals.summary: Cleanse your space using the elemental power of the ocean.

steps.title: Gather Water
steps.content: Carry ocean water to the area to be cleansed in a glass or metal flask.

steps.title: Asperge
steps.content: Asperge the space as needed, ideally using a fresh rosemary wand to flick the water.

rituals.title: Pine Asperging Spell
rituals.summary: A simple water-based cleanse using pine needles.

steps.title: Soak Pine
steps.content: Soak pine needles in warm water until the water is infused.

steps.title: Asperge
steps.content: Sprinkle the infused water throughout your home as needed.

rituals.title: Yarrow Juniper Cleanser
rituals.summary: A potent liquid formula used for space and altar cleansing.

steps.title: Blend Hydrosols
steps.content: Blend equal parts of juniper berry hydrosol and yarrow hydrosol.

steps.title: Add Berries
steps.content: Add a small handful of slightly bruised dried juniper berries to the liquid.

steps.title: Cleanse
steps.content: Sprinkle or wipe your altar, aura, or crystals with the liquid.

rituals.title: Broom Cleansing Spell
rituals.summary: Sweep away spiritual dust and negativity from your home.

steps.title: Sweep
steps.content: Use a broom to sweep the dust of your home from the west to the east.

steps.title: Dispose
steps.content: Collect the gathered dust, burn it, and toss the ashes outdoors.

rituals.title: Coconut Candle Cleanser
rituals.summary: Burn coconut-scented candles for long-term spiritual purification.

steps.title: Light Candle
steps.content: Light a coconut-scented candle in the space needing purification.

steps.title: Purify
steps.content: Allow the scent of the coconut to permeate the air, releasing long-term spiritual purification in a relaxed manner.

rituals.title: Exorcism Powder Spell
rituals.summary: Eliminate negative emotions and low-level spirit emanations with herbal powder.

steps.title: Grind Herbs
steps.content: Blend dried basil, frankincense, rosemary, rue, and yarrow, and grind into a fine powder.

steps.title: Blend Base
steps.content: Blend the herbal powder into a base of arrowroot powder.

steps.title: Sprinkle
steps.content: Sprinkle the powder lightly through the area to absorb malignancies in the air.

rituals.title: Basic Botanic Fumigation Spell
rituals.summary: Burn botanicals to release magical and spiritual antiseptic effects.

steps.title: Prepare Coals
steps.content: Light charcoal in a fireproof dish or censer.

steps.title: Burn Botanicals
steps.content: Sprinkle frankincense, myrrh, or sage on the lit charcoal.

steps.title: Waft Smoke
steps.content: Direct the cleansing smoke towards whatever needs cleansing.

rituals.title: Betony Cleansing Incense
rituals.summary: Disperse negative energy and lurking entities using betony.

steps.title: Burn
steps.content: Burn the dried herb betony on hot charcoals.

steps.title: Fumigate
steps.content: Let the smoke disperse negative energy, especially if you fear the negativity emanates from yourself.

rituals.title: Birch Cleansing Incense
rituals.summary: Burn birch to remove negative energy from your space.

steps.title: Burn Birch
steps.content: Light birch bark and twigs on fire.

steps.title: Cleanse
steps.content: Allow the smoke to permeate the area to remove negative energy.

rituals.title: Cast Out Evil Incense
rituals.summary: A powerful formula to cleanse areas profaned by evil or violence.

steps.title: Blend Ingredients
steps.content: Blend camphor, cinnamon, frankincense, myrrh, and sandalwood together.

steps.title: Powder
steps.content: Grind the blended ingredients into a fine powder.

steps.title: Burn
steps.content: Sprinkle the powder onto lit charcoal and burn.

rituals.title: Dragon's Blood Cleansing Incense
rituals.summary: Use dragon's blood resin to neutralize negative energy.

steps.title: Burn Resin
steps.content: Burn dragon's blood powder or resin on lit charcoals to provide a potent cleansing.

rituals.title: Garlic Cleansing Spell
rituals.summary: A potent spiritual formula using garlic peel to flush out negative entities.

steps.title: Grind Peel
steps.content: Place reserved garlic peel in a mortar and pestle, add brown sugar, and pound them together.

steps.title: Burn
steps.content: Sprinkle the mixture onto lit charcoal or a cast iron pan.

steps.title: Waft Fumes
steps.content: Waft the fumes over the areas to be cleansed, allowing the aroma to settle.

rituals.title: Liquidambar Cleansing Incense
rituals.summary: Enhance cleansing power by blending liquidambar with other botanicals.

steps.title: Blend
steps.content: Blend frankincense, liquidambar, mastic, and sandalwood.

steps.title: Burn
steps.content: Burn the mixture on lit charcoals and waft the smoke as desired.

rituals.title: Sacred Purification Incense
rituals.summary: Remove the negative and tainted, leaving an aura of holiness behind.

steps.title: Grind Ingredients
steps.content: Blend and grind benzoin, dragon's blood, frankincense, myrrh, sandalwood, and sea salt into a fine powder.

steps.title: Burn
steps.content: Sprinkle the powder onto a lit charcoal and burn.

rituals.title: Cleansed by the Bell
rituals.summary: Use the sound of bells to provide an extremely powerful space cleansing.

steps.title: Ring Bell
steps.content: Ring a silver, iron, or brass bell loudly throughout the space to disperse malevolent entities and negative debris.

rituals.title: Singing Bowls Cleansing
rituals.summary: Wash the space using the serene harmonies of singing bowls.

steps.title: Play Bowl
steps.content: Play a Himalayan singing bowl to wash the space and balance yin and yang energies before ritual.

rituals.title: Chinese Vinegar Steam Cleanser
rituals.summary: A weekly standard cleansing using the merged powers of water and fire.

steps.title: Boil Vinegar
steps.content: Boil rice vinegar in a shallow pan until it is steaming.

steps.title: Carry Steam
steps.content: Very carefully carry the steaming pan through all the rooms, letting the vapors cleanse corners and closets.

rituals.title: Glittering Coals Vapor Cleanser
rituals.summary: A quick burst of purification using coals and water.

steps.title: Toss Coals
steps.content: Toss burning coals into a bowl of water to create a sizzling steam for quick purification.

rituals.title: Aura Cleansing Floorwash
rituals.summary: Repel hexes and aggressive cleanse your space with a powerful floorwash.

steps.title: Make Infusion
steps.content: Make a strong infusion from dried agrimony and peppermint using boiling water.

steps.title: Prepare Bucket
steps.content: Strain out the herbs and add the infusion liquid to a bucket of water, along with white vinegar.

steps.title: Wash Floors
steps.content: Cleanse the floors and surfaces with the wash.

rituals.title: Dragon's Tears Floorwash
rituals.summary: A protective floorwash made from annatto seeds.

steps.title: Make Infusion
steps.content: Pour boiling water over dragon's tears (annatto seeds) to make a strong infusion.

steps.title: Wash Floors
steps.content: Add the infusion to a bucket of rinse water with vinegar and scrub the floors.

rituals.title: Ocean Water Floorwash
rituals.summary: Use ocean water and cascarilla for a deep magical space cleansing.

steps.title: Prepare Water
steps.content: Fill a bucket with ocean water. Add Cascarilla Powder, agar-agar, and powdered kelp.

steps.title: Wash Floors
steps.content: Use this water to wash your space and magically cleanse the area.

rituals.title: Coconut House Cleansing Spell
rituals.summary: Roll a coconut through the house to absorb negativity.

steps.title: Prepare Coconut
steps.content: Take a mouthful of rum and spray it over a whole coconut. Sprinkle Cascarilla Powder on the coconut.

steps.title: Roll Through House
steps.content: Roll the coconut from the back corner of your home out through the main entrance.

steps.title: Dispose at Crossroads
steps.content: Take the coconut to a remote four-way crossroads, throw it hard to crack it open, and walk away without looking back.

rituals.title: Jessamine Flowers House Cleansing
rituals.summary: Spread jessamine to remove residues of malevolent spells.

steps.title: Spread Petals
steps.content: Spread day Jessamine petals throughout the house for spiritual cleansing and to remove malevolent magic.

rituals.title: Lodestone Cleansing
rituals.summary: Use lodestones to magnetically absorb negativity from an area.

steps.title: Hold Lodestones
steps.content: Hold two matched pairs of lodestones (four total) in your hands.

steps.title: Absorb Negativity
steps.content: Slowly move through the area in a sunwise direction, encouraging the lodestones to absorb all negativity.

steps.title: Cleanse Lodestones
steps.content: Cleanse the lodestones intensively or bury them in the earth afterward.

rituals.title: Mother Holles Cleansing Spell
rituals.summary: Burn a blend of herbs associated with Mother Holle for intensive winter cleansing.

steps.title: Grind Herbs
steps.content: Grind chamomile, elder, mint, mugwort, yarrow, and other herbs into a powder.

steps.title: Burn
steps.content: Burn the powder and waft the smoke into all corners and crevices of the home.

rituals.title: Salt Cleansing Spell
rituals.summary: Sprinkle empowered salt around the home to absorb negativity.

steps.title: Infuse
steps.content: Make an infusion by pouring boiling water over High John the Conqueror roots.

steps.title: Moisten Salt
steps.content: Sprinkle the infusion lightly on salt to moisten it, and let it dry out.

steps.title: Scatter
steps.content: Sprinkle the salt around your home to absorb negativity.

rituals.title: Florida Water Stationary Cleanser
rituals.summary: A stationary liquid trap to absorb negativity.

steps.title: Prepare Pan
steps.content: Fill a pan with equal parts Florida Water and Holy Water. Add one camphor square.

steps.title: Position
steps.content: Keep the pan under the bed or in a strategic location to absorb negativity.

steps.title: Replace
steps.content: Change the water once a week or if it starts to smell off.

rituals.title: Onion Space Cleansing Spell
rituals.summary: Use onions to vacuum up spiritual dirt from a room.

steps.title: Chop Onion
steps.content: Chop one unpeeled onion into quarters by hand.

steps.title: Place
steps.content: Place one piece in each corner of a room overnight.

steps.title: Bury
steps.content: Bury them outside the following day. Repeat for five consecutive nights.

rituals.title: Rice Cleansing Spell
rituals.summary: Use raw white rice to absorb spiritual debris.

steps.title: Place Rice
steps.content: Place an uncovered bowl of raw white rice out to absorb negative energy.

steps.title: Discard
steps.content: Replace with fresh rice weekly, discarding the old rice outside the house.

rituals.title: Vinegar Cleanser
rituals.summary: Use plain vinegar as a cheap and strong cleansing agent.

steps.title: Place Vinegar
steps.content: Place plain vinegar in shallow uncovered pans throughout an area.

steps.title: Replace
steps.content: Replace weekly or when the liquid looks odd to maintain the absorbent cleansing effect.

rituals.title: Desert Sage Bath
rituals.summary: Bathe with desert sage to purify and alleviate feeling psychically unclean.

steps.title: Infuse
steps.content: Make an infusion of desert sage.

steps.title: Bathe
steps.content: Add it to your bath to cleanse and purify yourself.

rituals.title: Earth Smoke Bath
rituals.summary: Use fumitory to take a spiritually cleansing bath.

steps.title: Infuse
steps.content: Make a strong infusion by pouring boiling water over Earth Smoke (Fumitory).

steps.title: Bathe
steps.content: Strain and add the liquid to your bath.

rituals.title: Florida Water Personal Cleansing Spell
rituals.summary: A fast, spontaneous personal cleansing without a tub.

steps.title: Apply
steps.content: Undress completely and rub or sprinkle Florida Water all over yourself, including the soles of the feet and top of the head.

steps.title: Dry
steps.content: Allow yourself to air-dry before getting dressed.

rituals.title: Indigo Cleansing Bath
rituals.summary: A powerful blue bath to remove negativity.

steps.title: Prepare Indigo Water
steps.content: Place Turkish blue eye beads into a bottle of Indigo Water to boost power.

steps.title: Bathe
steps.content: Strain the Indigo Water into your bathwater and soak.

rituals.title: Lavender Bath
rituals.summary: A soothing bath dedicated to Hecate for spiritual washing.

steps.title: Add Lavender
steps.content: Add essential oil of lavender, lavender hydrosol, or an infusion to the bath.

steps.title: Bathe
steps.content: Soak in the water for spiritual and physical cleansing.

rituals.title: Lovage Bath
rituals.summary: Cleanse off degrading traces of failed relationships.

steps.title: Grind Root
steps.content: Grind and powder a dried lovage root.

steps.title: Bathe
steps.content: Sprinkle the powder onto your bathwater, distribute well, and soak.

rituals.title: Mandrake Bath
rituals.summary: An emergency, heavy-duty spiritual cleansing bath.

steps.title: Soak Mandrake
steps.content: Soak a true mandrake root in warm water overnight or for three days. Remove the root.

steps.title: Bathe
steps.content: Add the soaking liquid to a tub filled with water and bathe.

rituals.title: Maté Cleansing Bath
rituals.summary: Remove minor hexes and the lesser Evil Eye with maté tea.

steps.title: Infuse Tea
steps.content: Create a strong infusion by pouring boiling water over dried maté tea.

steps.title: Bathe
steps.content: Strain the cooled liquid and add it to your bath, or sponge it over yourself. Air dry.

rituals.title: Oak Leaf Bath
rituals.summary: A grounding bath to remove negativity.

steps.title: Prepare Faucet Bag
steps.content: Crumble five oak leaves into a muslin bag and attach it to the tub's faucet so water runs through it.

steps.title: Float Leaves
steps.content: Float five whole oak leaves in the bath water.

steps.title: Bathe
steps.content: Enter the bath and rub your body with the floating leaves.

rituals.title: Parsley Bath
rituals.summary: A cleansing bath (not for use during pregnancy) using parsley.

steps.title: Infuse
steps.content: Make an infusion by pouring boiling water over an entire bunch of parsley and one sliced parsley root.

steps.title: Bathe
steps.content: Add the infusion to bathwater and soak.

rituals.title: Pine-Bay Bath
rituals.summary: A protective and cleansing bath combining pine, bay, vinegar, and lemon.

steps.title: Infuse
steps.content: Make a strong infusion by pouring boiling water over combined pine needles and bay leaves.

steps.title: Bathe
steps.content: Add the strained water to your bath, together with a splash of vinegar and slices of lemon.

rituals.title: Yucca Bath
rituals.summary: Create cleansing suds from yucca roots to physically and magically clean the body.

steps.title: Pound Roots
steps.content: Pound dry yucca roots.

steps.title: Make Suds
steps.content: Whisk them into cold water to create suds.

steps.title: Cleanse
steps.content: Use to cleanse yourself, especially your head and hair.

rituals.title: Sacred Cleansing Incense
rituals.summary: A personal fumigation spell using sacred resins to leave an aura of holiness.

steps.title: Blend
steps.content: Blend benzoin, dragon's blood, and sandalwood.

steps.title: Fumigate
steps.content: Burn the blend on hot charcoals and pass yourself through the smoke.

rituals.title: Purification Bath
rituals.summary: Bathe with bay leaves and anise for thorough aura purification.

steps.title: Infuse
steps.content: Make a strong infusion by pouring boiling water over nine bay laurel leaves and two tablespoons of anise seeds.

steps.title: Bathe
steps.content: Let it cool, strain out the botanicals, and add the liquid to your tub of water.

rituals.title: Quick Fix Aura Cleanser
rituals.summary: A fast bath recipe when you need immediate cleansing.

steps.title: Prepare Bath
steps.content: Add one cup of salt and one cup of vinegar (lemon, apple cider, or rice) to a bath.

steps.title: Bathe
steps.content: Soak in the water to remove psychic debris quickly.

rituals.title: Sage Cleansing Spell
rituals.summary: Use powdered garden sage for a profound spiritual fumigation.

steps.title: Powder
steps.content: Dry garden sage and grind it into a fine powder with a mortar and pestle.

steps.title: Fumigate
steps.content: Sprinkle the powder onto a charcoal and use it to fumigate the body.

rituals.title: Salt Cleansing Bath
rituals.summary: A simple salt bath that creates a powerful psychic shield.

steps.title: Blend Salts
steps.content: Blend two cups of sea salt with one-half cup of baking soda.

steps.title: Bathe
steps.content: Add the mixture to the bath to simultaneously provide spiritual cleansing and create a psychic shield.

rituals.title: Seven Roses Bath
rituals.summary: A rejuvenating bath to regain innocence and optimism after hardship.

steps.title: Prepare Tub
steps.content: Fill the tub with water and throw in seven red roses, a handful of sea salt, a splash of vinegar, and a squeeze of lemon juice.

steps.title: Bathe
steps.content: Spend exactly seven minutes in the bath, rubbing yourself with the roses and submerging periodically.

steps.title: Dry
steps.content: Dry off with a clean towel and leave the tub uncleaned for at least an hour while your aura stabilizes.
